Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.

—

Release your creativity

the opportunity

—

Calling all artists! We need people to take charge of making our camp beautiful and stand out! Nothing attracts fellow bmers better than some eye catching art works.

This group is in charge of decorating the camp for day-time and night-time shenanigans! Anything creative goes!

Power is art

Art is power

*Photos by Nicolas Bartoli

the initiative

—

Critical camp decor items include any signage, tapestries, dreamcatchers etc. Be creative. Lights are always fun for night time.

  • Organize a few group sessions to organize existing decorations and work together on new projects.
  • Collect our dream catchers, these are a camp staple
  • Ensure we have correct signage, let it go sign, workshop schedule etc
  • LIGHTS! We love lights, and they become critical at night time, Work with infrastructure to get the lights connected to our solar setup
  • Organize some arts and crafts workshops, we have a very artistic group and youll get a lot of participants who want to contribute crafts
  • Bring arts and crafts supplies to camp so that we can continue to work on arts and crafts before and during the burn

Outstanding questions - Where is the Let It Go sign ? Will we have the lotus dome?
